text: Harry Garner Haskell Jr. (May 27, 1921 - January 16, 2020) was an American businessman and Republican politician. He was from Wilmington. He was mayor of Wilmington from 1969 to 1973 and represented Delaware in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1957 to 1959. Haskell Jr. died in Chadds Ford Township, Pennsylvania on January 16, 2020 at the age of 98.Former U.S. Congressman and Mayor of Wilmington dies ==References== ==Other websites== *Biographical Directory of the United States Congress *Delawareâ€™s Members of Congress *The Political Graveyard Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Wilmington, Delaware Category:United States representatives from Delaware Category:American mayors Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Politicians from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Coast Guard
title: Harry G. Haskell Jr.
